hypothesis_content.title: Aggregated Taker Flow Exhaustion at Key Levels
hypothesis_content.statement: When aggregated BTC & ETH spot taker buy volume reaches >65% of total spot volume at a key resistance level (prior high -3%), or taker sell volume >65% at key support (prior low +3%), it signals an imminent failed breakout/breakdown and regime reversion to NEUTRAL within 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme one-sided taker flow at obvious technical levels often represents 'weak hands' or trapped momentum chasing, exhausting immediate buying/selling pressure. This creates a high-probability fade opportunity as market makers and contrarians step in.
entry_conditions: Spot taker buy ratio > 65% at resistance OR spot taker sell ratio > 65% at support
Level is within 3% of a clear 30-day high/low
Futures funding rate is extreme (>0.05% or <-0.05%)
Order book shows large opposing liquidity wall within 1%

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reverses 5% from the level OR regime indicator moves to NEUTRAL
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price sustains a close >1% beyond the key level with taker flow confirming

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of such signals see the extreme taker flow continue and successfully break the level, leading to a momentum continuation instead of reversion.
